name: Turn Around: Abandoned village
detailed_description: Our character, wandering in search of food for his family, went to an unknown place. He saw the river and went along its shore. In the distance he saw a village which, at first glance, it seemed safe and was hoping to find help in small wooden houses. From this moment begins his mysterious story ...
about_the_game: Our character, wandering in search of food for his family, went to an unknown place. He saw the river and went along its shore. In the distance he saw a village which, at first glance, it seemed safe and was hoping to find help in small wooden houses. From this moment begins his mysterious story ...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higer
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTS 250
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
